title: Minerals and rocks. - 2nd edition
brief_description: Provides examples of minerals and their identification by physical properties: Streak testing, hardness, lustre and cleavage. Further analysis by X-ray diffraction and twin sections under a microscope is given. Also looks at crystals and their formation, problems of mining and other examples of gemstones.
